20110105141246.000|20110105141248.000|TR0|[[I/V]]
20110105141248.000|20110105141250.000|TR0|
20110105141250.000|20110105141252.500|TR0|It started off as a hippie squat
20110105141252.500|20110105141255.000|TR0|but now the self-proclaimed
20110105141255.000|20110105141257.500|TR0|neighbourhood in Copenhagen
20110105141257.500|20110105141300.000|TR0|known as Christiania is a
20110105141300.000|20110105141302.000|TR0|community where people live by
20110105141302.000|20110105141304.000|TR0|their own rules.
20110105141304.000|20110105141306.000|TR0|
20110105141306.000|20110105141308.000|TR0|No government, no politics, it
20110105141308.000|20110105141310.000|TR0|has been free and available to
20110105141310.000|20110105141312.500|TR0|all for forty years.
20110105141312.500|20110105141315.000|TR0|
20110105141315.000|20110105141317.500|TR0|But now local Danish authorities
20110105141317.500|20110105141320.000|TR0|want to cash in.
20110105141320.000|20110105141322.000|TR0|
20110105141322.000|20110105141324.000|TR0|RT's Irina Galushko has more.
20110105141324.000|20110105141326.000|TR0|
20110105141326.000|20110105141328.000|TR0|[[PKG]]
20110105141328.000|20110105141330.000|TR0|
20110105141330.000|20110105141332.500|TR0|Are you tired of pushing papers
20110105141332.500|20110105141335.000|TR0|9 to 5? Are you sick of the
20110105141335.000|20110105141337.500|TR0|government telling YOU what to
20110105141337.500|20110105141340.000|TR0|do? Then welcome to Christiania,
20110105141340.000|20110105141342.500|TR0|a country where things get done
20110105141342.500|20110105141345.000|TR0|BY the people FOR the people...
20110105141345.000|20110105141347.500|TR0|It began in 1971, when hippies
20110105141347.500|20110105141350.000|TR0|and free-thinkers squatted in
20110105141350.000|20110105141352.000|TR0|former military barracks...
20110105141352.000|20110105141354.000|TR0|Their aim was to build a society
20110105141354.000|20110105141356.000|TR0|from scratch... where the ONLY
20110105141356.000|20110105141358.000|TR0|government would be the
20110105141358.000|20110105141400.000|TR0|residents themselves. No
20110105141400.000|20110105141402.500|TR0|home-ownership... no violence...
20110105141402.500|20110105141405.000|TR0|it's a co-op community forged by
20110105141405.000|20110105141407.500|TR0|the 15-hundred strong locals.
20110105141407.500|20110105141410.000|TR0|... perfect for people like
20110105141410.000|20110105141412.000|TR0|Filmmaker Nils Vest, who has
20110105141412.000|20110105141414.000|TR0|lived in Christiania since it
20110105141414.000|20110105141416.000|TR0|was founded.
20110105141416.000|20110105141418.000|TR0|
20110105141418.000|20110105141420.000|TR0|'If you have this ability to
20110105141420.000|20110105141422.500|TR0|administer yourself, then you
20110105141422.500|20110105141425.000|TR0|also bear responsibility for
20110105141425.000|20110105141427.500|TR0|your surroundings.. and that's
20110105141427.500|20110105141430.000|TR0|something that's lost in the
20110105141430.000|20110105141432.000|TR0|large cities today.'
20110105141432.000|20110105141434.000|TR0|
20110105141434.000|20110105141436.000|TR0|For Nils, this is the most
20110105141436.000|20110105141438.000|TR0|peaceful and welcoming place you
20110105141438.000|20110105141440.000|TR0|could find in Denmark...
20110105141440.000|20110105141442.500|TR0|possibly, in all of Europe.
20110105141442.500|20110105141445.000|TR0|
20110105141445.000|20110105141447.500|TR0|We want to keep up some of the
20110105141447.500|20110105141450.000|TR0|virtues of the village where
20110105141450.000|20110105141452.000|TR0|people know each other and feel

20110105141454.000|20110105141456.000|TR0|responsibility for each other...'
20110105141456.000|20110105141458.000|TR0|
20110105141458.000|20110105141500.000|TR0|So, what's their secret to a
20110105141500.000|20110105141502.500|TR0|peaceful coexistence?
20110105141502.500|20110105141505.000|TR0|
20110105141505.000|20110105141507.500|TR0|'People actually take
20110105141507.500|20110105141510.000|TR0|responsibility for the area
20110105141510.000|20110105141512.000|TR0|themselves. They don't expect a
20110105141512.000|20110105141514.000|TR0|guy from the government of the
20110105141514.000|20110105141516.000|TR0|city to come and fix things. We
20110105141516.000|20110105141518.000|TR0|do it ourselves.'
20110105141518.000|20110105141520.000|TR0|
20110105141520.000|20110105141522.500|TR0|In fact, Christiania seems to be
20110105141522.500|20110105141525.000|TR0|extremely attractive to most
20110105141525.000|20110105141527.500|TR0|Danes -- a recent newspaper poll
20110105141527.500|20110105141530.000|TR0|found 150-THOUSAND Copenhagen

20110105141536.000|20110105141538.000|TR0|
20110105141538.000|20110105141540.000|TR0|'It's a fairytale atmosphere

20110105141550.000|20110105141552.500|TR0|

20110105141600.000|20110105141602.000|TR0|to swing the ax at Christiania.
20110105141602.000|20110105141604.000|TR0|
20110105141604.000|20110105141606.000|TR0|'The land is owned by the state
20110105141606.000|20110105141608.000|TR0|and the state can do anything
20110105141608.000|20110105141610.000|TR0|about it if they want more
20110105141610.000|20110105141612.500|TR0|housing to be built there...'
20110105141612.500|20110105141615.000|TR0|
20110105141615.000|20110105141617.500|TR0|That's the crux of the problem
20110105141617.500|20110105141620.000|TR0|-- residents pay their taxes to
20110105141620.000|20110105141622.000|TR0|the state, and a service fee to
20110105141622.000|20110105141624.000|TR0|Christiania... but they DO NOT
20110105141624.000|20110105141626.000|TR0|OWN the houses they live in.
20110105141626.000|20110105141628.000|TR0|
20110105141628.000|20110105141630.000|TR0|'You're not allowed to make any
20110105141630.000|20110105141632.500|TR0|money off your house in here.
20110105141632.500|20110105141635.000|TR0|The houses are owned by
20110105141635.000|20110105141637.500|TR0|Christiania and you live there
20110105141637.500|20110105141640.000|TR0|and rent it from Christiania and
20110105141640.000|20110105141642.000|TR0|you can't sell it on cos we
20110105141642.000|20110105141644.000|TR0|don't want speculation and
